data_drag_listbox module¶

class data_node_editor.data_drag_listbox.DragListBox(parent: Optional[PyQt5.QtWidgets.QWidget] = None)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QListWidget

Class implementing a list of available :class:’~data_node_base.DataNode’

Instantiates :class:’~data_drag_listbox.rst.DragListBox’

Subclass QListWidget to implement specific drag features creating nodes when dropping on a :class:’~data_subwindow.DataSubWindow’ :param parent: Parent widget :type parent: Optional[QWidget]
